title: Stone quarrying, soil excavation, stone crushing or other similar activities, mining activity, bricks kilns, caretaker's quarters or residential quarters for essential staff upto maximum built-up area 20 sq
clause_text: Stone quarrying, soil excavation, stone crushing or other similar activities, mining activity, bricks kilns, caretaker's quarters or residential quarters for essential staff upto maximum built-up area 20 sq.m. ancillary buildings like site offices, cafeteria with maximum built-up area upto 250 sq.m.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
